bibl.title: A Guide to Greco-Roman Hawara in the Fayum and Its Death Industry.
bibl.note: Article compte rendu de: Inge Uytterhoeven, Hawara in the Graeco-Roman Period. Life and Death in a Fayum Village = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 174 (Leuven - Paris - Walpole, MA, 2009).
